Titles.jpn: 薬師寺涼子の怪奇事件簿

Summaries.eng: Ryōko Yakushiji, a Superintendent in the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department and a graduate of Tokyo University's Law Faculty and a multilingual person, works with Junichirō Izumida to investigate seemingly paranormal, supernatural or bizarre events that get involved in criminal cases. Ryōko works with her colleagues and subordinates, including her rival Yukiko Muromachi, alongside JACES security forces personnel and her personal maids Lucienne and Marianne to resolve the cases before they go out of hand.
Summaries.jpn: 頭脳明晰、運動神経抜群、おまけに絶世の美人という一見完璧な女性の薬師寺涼子警視。だが、彼女は女王気質でわが道まっしぐらというトンデモナイ性格だった。そんな涼子に振り回されながらも、彼女をサポートする直属の部下、泉田準一郎警部補。この2人が科学では解明できないさまざまな“怪奇事件”に挑む…！

Titles.jpn: 銀座クライムタワー（前編）

Summaries.eng: Superintendent Ryōko Yakushiji and her subordinate, Assistant Inspector Junichirō Izumida of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department, launch an investigation after they witness a man combust somewhere in Ginza. The two officers learn that the combustion cases may be tied with a known religious cult, but Ryōko has to endure her rivalry with fellow superintendent Yukiko Muromachi and an assassin out to get her.
Summaries.jpn: 泉田は涼子に連れられて銀座に向かった。そんな2人の目の前で、瞬時に人間がミイラ化するという事件が発生。そして現場で不審な動きを見せた人影を追跡する。だが銀座プライムタウン内で見失ってしまい…。

Titles.jpn: 銀座クライムタワー（後編）

Summaries.eng: Ryōko nearly survives an assassination attempt with the assassin sacrificing herself by ingesting a suicide pill that made her combust. She and Izumida continue to investigate, with their case getting complicated when a forensics scientist the two officers knew for a long time is the leader of the cult and that they had been using growth hormones to make an ordinary snake grow large.
Summaries.jpn: ミイラ化事件の原因は、毒物の混入された輸入食材によることが判明。さらに曽我がその検疫を行った「検研」の会長であること、月読会の幹部であることも分かった。そんな矢先に司法解剖を担当した研究所が燃え…。

Summaries.eng: Two newspaper reporters try to follow Ryōko and Izumida around in order to get a potential story to be used against the former, but are seemingly thwarted in their plans when JACES security forces intervene on Ryōko's behalf.
Summaries.jpn: 警視庁では記者会見が行われ、JACESのヘリが現場で目撃されたことが質問されていた。それをきっかけにして、涼子の傍若無人振りを知った毎朝新聞の記者が、その存在を知らしめようと奮闘するが…。

Titles.jpn: 武蔵野すみれいろどき

Summaries.eng: Ryōko and Izumida investigate a former Health, Labour and Welfare minister due to illegal human experimentation of human cells with cells from an unknown human species, which resulted in a monster-like infant. The two officers try to eliminate the creature before they decided to let it die due to rapid cell degeneration.
Summaries.jpn: 涼子は、国会議員でありDK製薬会長の桂川平蔵にアポなしの面会を申し込み、一度は断られたが「54121」と呟くと許可される。その数字は、DK製薬が進めてきた違法の細胞実験のプロジェクトナンバーだった。

Titles.eng: The Bug That Crawls the Omotesandou

Summaries.eng: A mad counter-terrorist robot goes haywire after a traffic accident and kills armed security guards. Ryōko and Izumida are drawn to the situation after the former had claimed of hearing gunshots. The situation becomes complicated when Izumida's elementary school cousin Mana gets involved and armed tactical teams of Japan Private Police (JPP), a JACES rival, are secretly deployed in order to destroy their own invention and conceal evidence on the victims the robot had killed.
Summaries.jpn: 表参道で涼子と泉田は小学6年生の従妹である真奈の相談に乗っていた。すると、不意に涼子の耳が銃声を捉え、2人は現場の青山ブロードウェイへと駆け付けた。だが、そこには多数の遺体が転がっていて…。

Titles.jpn: メイド in 霞ヶ関

Summaries.eng: Marianne and Lucienne, Ryoko's maids, arrived in Narita International Airport after the two subdued a thief after kicking their baggage cart to knock him out. The two maids, with Ryoko and Izumida, investigate the appearance of a giant salamander beneath the Greater Tokyo Area with an underground resort being under by corrupt politicians as they use armed gunmen to kill the creature.
Summaries.jpn: 涼子のパリ別邸のメイドであるマリアンヌとリュシエンヌを迎えるため、泉田と涼子は成田空港に来ていた。2人を迎え、涼子の自宅へ戻る途中でみんなを乗せた地下鉄が急停止してしまう。一行は先頭車両に駆け付け…。

Summaries.eng: Ryoko and Junichiro head to Okinawa to investigate the reclusive JPP founder Ryojin Tadomura. As the two begin their stay in the island, mutant seeds from mangrove trees that were experimented on by JPP scientists are responsible for having its personnel turn against humans until the mutateed mangrove in the destroyed Tadomura villa is destroyed by Marianne by napalm grenades.
Summaries.jpn: 泉田は休暇中の涼子に同行して、沖縄県のZ島に上陸。彼女が向かったのは、日本施設警察の会長である田戸村の別荘だった。田戸村はマングローブ樹林に別荘を建てたことから、自然活動家に抗議を受けているという。

Summaries.eng: When numerous people are committing suicide, including a well-known police forensics scientist, Ryoko and Izumida investigate it and find out that a university professor and a new species of ultrasound crickets are responsible for the mysterious suicides with some of them still alive after the professor's death by a crashing truck.
Summaries.jpn: 「自殺団地」に関するメールが、刑事部参事官付室に寄せられた。そこには音波虫なるものが事件を引き起こしているとある。そこで、自殺団地から飛び降りた緑川の勤務先の多摩音響研究所で事件の情報収集を行うと…。

Summaries.eng: Ryoko goes into hiding after the media broadcasts negative articles and news reports about her fame and her standing with the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. Ryoko takes Izumida to a NPP stronghold in the Greater Tokyo Area after being defamed by a secret organization of renegade police officials led by a woman named Ruriko Isurugi. In the NPP stronghold, Ryoko and Izumida discover a child who has the same identical facial features like the former.
Summaries.jpn: 涼子が海外へ向かった。同僚たちは涼子の不在を喜んでいるが、泉田は単独で行動した涼子に対して違和感を覚える。そんな中、泉田は室町由紀子から、警視庁芝庁舎を牛耳る「芝の女王」を捜査している話を聞く。

Summaries.eng: Ryoko and Izumida find out that the child had no memories of herself, dubbing her Monami. Meanwhile, Ruriko makes an alliance with the Defense Minister on taking on Ryoko after reports of explosions have hit the DK Pharmaceuticals and other public buildings. Distraught over Ryoko planning on keeping her out of Japan, Monami runs away only to be captured by JPP operatives in an ambush with centipede robots until a giant toad came out of a nearby lake and assisted Izumida.
Summaries.jpn: 泉田は帰国した涼子に有無を言わさず連れられ、DK製薬豊洲支部に突入する。一企業が敷くには異常に厳重な警備体制をくぐり抜けた涼子たちは、施設の中枢で涼子に激似な少女を発見。その少女を施設から連れ去り…。

Summaries.eng: Monami seeks refuge with Izumida after escaping from captivity. Ryoko reveals that Ruriko had co-founded JACES as the Japanese Empire Security Service but left after her grandfather Masamoto refused to allow Ruriko to use JESS as a refuge for ex-Imperial military servicemen to revive a true Japanese armed forces. Izumida learns from Kazuma, Ryoko's personal assistant, that Monami was cloned in order to wrestle control of JACES away from the Yakushiji family using an ancient technique of making people called Hangon and cloning technology.
Summaries.jpn: もなみが泉田の目の前で、NPPの工作員に連れ去られてしまう。ところが、そんなもなみが泉田の元に全身ずぶ濡れで駆け込んできた。その上、彼女の身体は短期間のうちに明らかな成長を見せていた。

Titles.jpn: 東京デッド・オア・ラブ（前編）

Summaries.eng: Ruriko and other conspirators in the JGSDF and the JPP had planned to crush Ryoko Yakushiji and the whole of JACES under the guise of anti-terrorist training for the Greater Tokyo Area. Ryoko decides to fight Shiba on her own with JPP forces attacking both her and her own subordinates with Muromachi's. Izumida leaves the Yakushiji residence to see Ryoko, who had been previously attacked by an AH-64 Apache and a Type 90 MBT when another Type 90 arrives in a harbor to finish off Ryoko for good.
Summaries.jpn: 涼子と泉田はもなみを追って廃工場に踏み込んだ。そこで生亡者と名付けられた動く腐乱死体を見て、それが石動瑠璃子の研究で生み出された失敗作であることを知る。そして唯一の成功例がもなみだったのだ。

Titles.jpn: 東京デッド・オア・ラブ（後編）

Summaries.eng: The Type 90 tank, revealed to be under the control of Marianne and Lucienne, is used by Ryoko and Junichiro to head to Central Tokyo as they take out renegade JGSDF Type 90s to defeat Ruriko by taking out Tokyo Tower as the source of the radiowaves that had been used to brainwash JPP operatives under her command. Monami was rescued by Ryoko and Junichiro after defeating Ruriko and Kazuma as the JPP operatives, with their brainwashing removed, panic in fear due to the destroyed Tokyo Tower.
Summaries.jpn: 涼子と、瑠璃子率いるNPPとの戦闘は激化。頼もしいメイドたちも加わり、泉田は瑠璃子の拠点・芝庁舎を目指す。だが、涼子たちは瑠璃子による毒電波で操られた自衛隊に取り囲まれる。涼子はある奇策を繰り出し…。
